title: Not all want to imitate the West

content.prompt: Which of the following would most directly <u>challenge</u> the authorâ€™s argument that people all over the world aspire to imitate the West?

choices.label: The market reforms undertaken by Deng Xiaoping in China after the Cultural Revolution
The increasing global influence of American popular culture
The development of international free market institutions such as the World Trade Organization
The growth of fundamentalist religious movements advocating theocratic government

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
